page.title: 17OUR VILLAGE POST OFFICE
page.content: Our post office is one of 11000 rural post offices in Britain.Nowadays everything is very modernized and much more convenient.Our post office sells birthday cards,post cards and equipment for philately.Our post office also deals with giro bank,child allowance and pensions.We have got a screen which tells you about the post office.There are 3 people that work in the post office Mr.Cook and 3 partime assistants.They are very friendly.The post office also sells bus and rail tickets.It is convenient that the nearest town is Grimsby and the bus fairs nearly a pound.They also have a photo copying machine.There are 5 post ladies (they all use bikes) and deliver to approx 840 houses.
